```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readxl)
railroads <- read_excel("/Users/mahashraya/Documents/DACSS/DACSS601August2021/_data/StateCounty2012.xls")
library(rmarkdown)
railroad_table <- paged_table(railroads, options = list(rows.print = 20, cols.print = 10))
```
```{r show table}
railroad_table
```
